PlaqueTec 和 Babraham Institute 合作进行早期靶点发现和开发校园创新奖 (CIA) 资助的项目评估了预计能与 PlaqueTec 发现的促炎蛋白结合的先导化合物https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/PlaqueTec-and-the-Babraham-Institute-collaborate-on-early-phase-target-discovery-and-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/PlaqueTec-and-the-Babraham-Institute-collaborate-on-early-phase-target-discovery-and-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c980f92c-f870-4fc2-bf7a-b1f7c58adb89 Tue, 14 May 2024 05:59:00 -0400 PlaqueTec and the Babraham Institute collaborate on early phase target discovery and development
儿童可以通过教育祖父母来提高疫苗接种率向中国大学生提供的健康教育干预是否会增加严重急性呼吸综合征冠状病毒 2 (SARS-CoV-2) 加强疫苗接种。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/Children-can-boost-vaccination-rates-by-education-their-grandparents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/Children-can-boost-vaccination-rates-by-education-their-grandparents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0bbaccdf-c054-40ee-a38e-19dddb073a30 Tue, 14 May 2024 05:34:00 -0400 Children can boost vaccination rates by educating their grandparents
代谢组学分析揭示肠道微生物在心血管疾病风险中的作用肠道细菌对非高密度脂蛋白胆固醇（非 HDL-c）变异的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/Metabolomic-analysis-sheds-light-on-gut-microbes-role-in-cardiosculpture-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/Metabolomic-analysis-sheds-light-on-gut-microbes-role-in-cardioangio-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e17​​36b99-51bf-4d23-a3cb-3dc9795af9e3 Tue, 14 May 2024 05:00:00 -0400 Metabolomic analysis sheds light on gut microbes' role in cardiovascular disease risk
增强型半导体系统翻新：NIKON Precision 苏格兰工厂的 Monmouth Scientific 模块化洁净室NIKON Precision 寻求通过将先进的洁净室设施纳入其位于苏格兰的现有结构中来增强其半导体机械翻新流程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/Enhanced-Semiconductor-System-Refurbishment-The-Monmouth-Scientific-Modular-Cleanroom-at-NIKON-Precisions-Scottish-Facility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/Enhanced-Semiconductor-System-Refurbishment-The-Monmouth-Scientific-Modular-Cleanroom-at-NIKON-Precisions-Scottish-Facility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84114b0c-a4b8-472c-9207-5f4b4e735e43 Tue, 14 May 2024 04:32:00 -0400 Enhanced Semiconductor System Refurbishment: The Monmouth Scientific Modular Cleanroom at NIKON Precision's Scottish Facility
生酮饮食促进心理健康：研究表明压力减轻并改善情绪诺森比亚大学最近的一项营养学研究探讨了坚持生酮饮食如何影响普通人群的心理健康，发现平静、满足、警觉和整体情绪健康有所改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/Ketogenic-diet-boosts-mental-health-Study-reveals-reduced-stress-and-improved-mood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/Ketogenic-diet-boosts-mental-health-Study-reveals-reduced-stress-and-improved-mood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed94e1f0-c16c-42b0-b9af-ecd07d5b6057 Tue, 14 May 2024 00:31:00 -0400 Ketogenic diet boosts mental health: Study reveals reduced stress and improved mood
气候变化威胁欧洲健康：需要采取紧急行动保护弱势群体《柳叶刀公共卫生》最近的一份报告详细介绍了气候变化如何通过 42 个指标影响欧洲人类健康，强调采取气候行动保护弱势群体和解决健康不平等问题的紧迫性。该报告强调了重大的健康风险和公平干预措施的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/Climate-change-threatens-health-in-Europe-Urgent-action-needed-to-protect-vulnerable-populations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/Climate-change-threatens-health-in-Europe-Urgent-action-needed-to-protect-vulnerable-populations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=443f843d-e73f-4428-9342-48e6e512de13 Tue, 14 May 2024 00:06:00 -0400 Climate change threatens health in Europe: Urgent action needed to protect vulnerable populations
什么是“免疫自我”？这个概念如何有利于免疫学研究？透视综述讨论了“免疫自我”的概念以及适应性免疫反应如何受到自相似性的影响。该研究强调了定义自相似性及其对免疫学研究的影响方面的进展和挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/What-is-the-e28098immune-selfe28099-and-how-can-this-concept-benefit-immunological-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/What-is-the-e28098immune-selfe28099-and-how-can-this-concept-benefit-immunological-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6a0b42c-1503-49e2-8fa3-6f88c0ae3172 Mon, 13 May 2024 23:46:00 -0400 What is the ‘immune self,’ and how can this concept benefit immunological research?
饮食和肠道微生物群：你吃的东西如何影响你的肠道健康《肠道微生物》发表的一篇系统综述发现，饮食模式、营养素、生物活性化合物和食品添加剂会影响肠道微生物群。然而，这种关联主要是常规分析的营养素，而不是与微生物群相关的营养素https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Diet-and-gut-microbiota-how-what-you-eat-shapes-your-gut-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Diet-and-gut-microbiota-how-what-you-eat-shapes-your-gut-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0699b5dc-22d3-428b-826e-a51fbf92157b Mon, 13 May 2024 23:30:00 -0400 Diet and gut microbiota: how what you eat shapes your gut health
运动和饮食相结合的干预措施显示出改善卵巢癌患者预后的潜力英国癌症杂志最近的一项研究评估了运动和饮食干预相结合对卵巢癌患者疲劳、身体成分和身体功能的影响。 PADOVA 试验发现，干预措施的有效性很大程度上取决于患者的依从性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Combined-exercise-and-diet-interventions-show-potial-in-improving-ovarian-cancer-病人-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Combined-exercise-and-diet-interventions-show-potial-in-improving-ovarian-cancer-病人-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e9e9797-9437-4a7f-82c9-57e8373ee4a2 Mon, 13 May 2024 23:12:00 -0400 Combined exercise and diet interventions show potential in improving ovarian cancer patients' outcomes
研究表明，教育可以提高幸福感，但智力可能会降低你的幸福感研究探讨了教育程度、智力和幸福感之间的因果关系，结果表明，虽然教育对幸福感产生积极影响，但较高的智力可能会产生负面影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Education-boosts-well-being-but-intelligence-can-bring-you-down-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Education-boosts-well-being-but-intelligence-can-bring-you-down-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78359082-b9b5-432d-b2de-fb4e56180a36 Mon, 13 May 2024 21:19:00 -0400 Education boosts well-being, but intelligence can bring you down, study suggests
